The information contained in the DVD is good, it works and the host knows what she is talking about. She demonstrates the steps necessary in order to ejaculate, gives tips on what can be done to improve ejaculation like drinking water before starting to masturbate, leg positioning during masturbation etc. Great information for both men and woman and highly recommended as you will see your lady reach new levels of pleasure. The only downside of the DVD is the production. Bad audio, shaky camera and sometimes the lighting is not even average. It looks like it is home made and that is why I deducted one star. Highly recommended.
